story.title: From a Single Lens to a Global Narrative.
story.p1: It started with a simple belief: that weddings aren't just events; they are the closing chapters of one life and the opening lines of another. Ten years ago, we picked up a camera not to document proceedings, but to capture feelings.
story.p2: What began in a small studio in Delhi has grown into a global collective of visual storytellers. We've traveled to 25 countries, witnessed thousands of vows, and learned one universal truth: every love story has a rhythm, and our job is to find it.
story.p3: We don't follow trends. We don't use templates. We approach every wedding as a blank canvas, painting with light, shadow, and unscripted emotion.

philosophy.subtitle: Our Philosophy
philosophy.title: "We chase the moments you didn't know were happening."

principles.title: Soul
principles.text: We value raw emotion over perfection. We'd rather capture a blurry laugh than a stiff pose.

principles.title: Cinema
principles.text: Your life is a movie. We film it that way. Wide angles, dramatic lighting, and thoughtful composition.

principles.title: Legacy
principles.text: We aren't making content for Instagram. We are making heirlooms for your grandchildren.
